channel.title: Moparscape.org new section
channel.description:
I think there should be a snippit/Config section for short codes, which arnt long enought for tutorials.
<3 _ikram
Maybe it can be Chilled of the tutorial section.

item.title: Moparscape.org new section
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote="_ikram, post:1, topic:282421"]I think there should be a snippit/Config section for short codes, which arnt long enought for tutorials.

<3 _ikram

Maybe it can be Chilled of the tutorial section.[/quote]
It’s not needed, it’ll just be a spot for shit messy code like mine to be posted.

item.title: Moparscape.org new section
item.dc:creator: @Mybb Mybb
item.description:
@Mybb wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:16, topic:282421”]Site discussions for Moparscape.org may be posted here; as Moparisthebest said, there isn’t really a place for them over there anyway.

@Thread: We take every idea into account, but you have to remember that we aren’t to be spoonfeeding people when they are too lazy to use the search button to figure out how to make someone a mod on their server.[/quote]

ya i n0 rite
[center] Useless posts are considered spam.[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape.org new section
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Site discussions for Moparscape.org may be posted here; as Moparisthebest said, there isn’t really a place for them over there anyway.

@Thread: We take every idea into account, but you have to remember that we aren’t to be spoonfeeding people when they are too lazy to use the search button to figure out how to make someone a mod on their server.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape.org new section
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

m.dog311:

wat (sorry, couldn’t resist).

Don’t worry, no one expects much from Moparscape Moderators anyways.

What didn't you understand? Sure there were a few grammatical errors, but it is still easily understandable. Stop trying to jump on the bandwagon and be cool by posting things like that.
Don't bother, people never listen. Also, gratz on the Java Award.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape.org new section
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

There is nothing wrong with posting a moparisthebest.com suggestion here. I suppose it is the most proper place to put them.

As to the suggestion though, I don’t think it is needed. Anything that short should be able to be figured out by itself. (like the hostname to ip address thing for example)

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape.org new section
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:12, topic:282421”][quote author=Mybb link=topic=373185.msg2817082#msg2817082 date=1244348503]

_ikram, go back to where you came from. You don’t belong here.

ahem cough

Back to topic. According to [quote]Post in here if you have any comments/suggestions for moparisthebest.com and site forums. [/quote] this should be a moparisthebest.com only discussion.

Yes, I agree with you there T4_. We should only post in general site discussion of what is indicated which is moparisthebest.com and site forums but nothing else.

wat
[/quote]What didn’t you understand? Sure there were a few grammatical errors, but it is still easily understandable. Stop trying to jump on the bandwagon and be cool by posting things like that.[/quote]
wat (sorry, couldn’t resist).

Ontopic: This has been suggested by many times before, by both normal members and members of the staff. The closest thing we got was a thread. So don’t get your hopes up.

Read full topic
